text.text: Hey, just wanted to say hope you guys have a {b}Merry Christmas and Happy Holidays!{/b} I just released the final version for the 2D Side Scroller LITE Version {a=https://the-real-sauce.itch.io/2d-side-scrolling-in-renpy-lite}(   HERE   ){/a}, Also keep an eye on future projects, the pro version of the template is close to release aswell and will contain many features.
